climbs.name: Thunderbird
climbs.fa: Matt Scherer, Craig Kenyon, and Bethany Berres, 7/8/2021 Ground up.

content.description: A very exciting and exposed route that will keep your attention until the top. P1: begin climbing the large chimney/crack feature on the north face. Jam, stem and chimney up through a steep section, then move left on obvious horizontal rail. Follow rail to belay nook. P2: from the belay traverse left and down to foot ledge system. Follow ledge system to a large flat top flake and then climb face into flared chimney to summit. Descent: leave cord or NSRÂ
content.protection: Standard needles rack (micro to large), gear anchors.

content.description: Thunder rock is the large independent spire located at the base of the spire 3 ridge. It hosts 3 fun adventure routes.
